TUTO_2: Welcome to the tutorial of Eurostat's Energy dasboard visualization tool. This guided tour will show you the main ways of interacting with the tool.
TUTO_4: This main window represents the energy statistics and indicators for the selected country.
TUTO_6: Click in a graph to change between different chart types for diferent visualizations of the data.
TUTO_8: Use this option to filter the countries.
TUTO_10: Use this option to change the language of the tool, it supports English, French or German.
TUTO_11: That is it for our tour.
TUTO_12: If you find this visualisation tool useful, please show your support by sharing it with others on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn. Thank you!
